summary:
Investment professional with focus on companies with strong growth opportunities and long-term investment potential. Background in Corporate Finance/M&A with involvement in >30 transactions across sectors in different situations including sale, acquisitions, divestments (incl. carve-out situations), mergers, distressed/restructuring situations and growth capital investments. In addition corporate / in-house M&A experience with multiple transactions and investment cases for greenfield activities in target growth areas.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
